name: Group Facilitation 101
description:
The objective of this facilitation workshop is to unlock the inherent potential within Zuzaluâ€™s community by fostering the skills and knowledge necessary for effective, collaborative, and open-source growth.

This workshop will equip participants with the tools to facilitate group discussions, manage diverse dynamics, and engage in decentralized decision-making processes. Through this, we aim to cultivate an environment where every community member feels empowered to contribute and innovate!
